CustomField.formula: IF(BEGINS(Subject,'Email:'),'Email', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'Sent Email:'),'Email', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'Call'),'Call', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'LinkedIn Sales Navigator: InMail'),'LinkedIn - InMail', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'LinkedIn Sales Navigator: Research'),'LinkedIn - Research', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'LinkedIn Sales Navigator: Connection Request'),'LinkedIn - Connection Request', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'LinkedIn Sales Navigator: Ask for an Introduction'),'LinkedIn - Ask for an Introduction', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'Meeting Booked:'),'Meeting', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'Other:'),'Other', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'Reply:'),'Reply', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'Note'),'Note', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'Hot Lead:'),'Hot Lead', IF(BEGINS(Subject,'Recording:'),'Conversation Intelligence Recording', NULL)))))))))))))
CustomField.label: SalesLoft Type
